title: Derwin Gray on Sermon Series Planning - Episode 244
itunes:title: Derwin Gray on Sermon Series Planning
description:
In the second episode of our series on preaching and teaching best practices, Derwin Gray, the Founding and Lead Pastor of Transformation Church and a former NFL player, joins us to discuss his approach to weekly sermon prep, yearly series planning, and more.

Free Webinar: Preaching Best Practices on May 19

Looking for more innovative approaches to preaching and teaching? Join Tony Morgan, Clay Scroggins, Dan Lian, and more on May 19 for this free 1-hour webinar event. Register today.
